languages.text: "Ты знаешь Ирлиэт? Дитя, что ступило на Путь Изгоя и провела долгие годы вдали от дома средь рождающихся и гаснущих звезд?" {n}Взгляд эльдара становится чуть теплее.{/n} "Поведай мне о ее судьбе, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Ты знаешь Ирлиэт? Дитя, что ступило на Путь Изгоя и провела долгие годы вдали от дома средь рождающихся и гаснущих звезд?" {n}Взгляд эльдара становится чуть теплее.{/n} "Поведай мне о ее судьбе, мон-кай".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Ты знаешь Ирлиэт? Дитя, что ступило на Путь Изгоя и провела долгие годы вдали от дома средь рождающихся и гаснущих звезд?" {n}Взгляд эльдара становится чуть теплее.{/n} "Поведай мне о ее судьбе, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze warms up a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze warms up a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Conoces a Yrliet? La niña que emprendió la Senda de la Proscrita y se marchó para pasar largos años lejos de su hogar, presenciando el nacimiento de unas estrellas y la muerte de otras?». {n}Los ojos del Aeldari se empañan un poco.{/n} «Dime adónde la ha llevado su senda, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «¿Conoces a Yrliet? La niña que emprendió la Senda de la Proscrita y se marchó para pasar largos años lejos de su hogar, presenciando el nacimiento de unas estrellas y la muerte de otras?». {n}Los ojos del Aeldari se empañan un poco.{/n} «Dime adónde la ha llevado su senda, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「ユリエットを知っているのか？長く故郷を離れ、星々の誕生と消滅を眺めながら追放者の道を歩んでいる子供のことを？」{n}アエルダリのまなざしが少し和らいだ。{/n}「彼女の道が彼女をどこに連れて行ったのか教えてくれ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットを知っているのか？長く故郷を離れ、星々の誕生と消滅を眺めながら追放者の道を歩んでいる子供のことを？」{n}アエルダリのまなざしが少し和らいだ。{/n}「彼女の道が彼女をどこに連れて行ったのか教えてくれ、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你认识伊莉耶特？就是那个踏上流浪者道途，远离家乡多年，见证群星诞生与陨灭的孩子吗？”{n}艾达灵族的目光稍微柔和了一些。{/n}“告诉我，她的道途把她带到了哪里？”
languages.original_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “你认识伊莉耶特？就是那个踏上流浪者道途，远离家乡多年，见证群星诞生与陨灭的孩子吗？”{n}艾达灵族的目光稍微柔和了一些。{/n}“告诉我，她的道途把她带到了哪里？”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Vous connaissez Yrliet ? L'enfant qui a suivi la Voie de l'Errance pour passer de longues années loin des siens, à regarder les étoiles naître et d'autres disparaître ? {n}Le regard de l'Aeldari s'adoucit quelque peu.{/n} Dites-moi où sa Voie l'a menée, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Vous connaissez Yrliet ? L'enfant qui a suivi la Voie de l'Errance pour passer de longues années loin des siens, à regarder les étoiles naître et d'autres disparaître ? {n}Le regard de l'Aeldari s'adoucit quelque peu.{/n} Dites-moi où sa Voie l'a menée, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ihr kennt Yrliet? Das Kind, das loszog und den Pfad der Ausgestoßenen nahm und viele Jahre weit entfernt von seiner Heimat verbrachte und dabei mit ansehen konnte, wie Sterne geboren werden und andere verblassen?" {n}Der Blick des Aeldari taut ein bisschen auf.{/n} "Erzählt mir, wohin ihr Weg sie geführt hat, Chem-Pan-Sey,"
languages.original_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr kennt Yrliet? Das Kind, das loszog und den Pfad der Ausgestoßenen nahm und viele Jahre weit entfernt von seiner Heimat verbrachte und dabei mit ansehen konnte, wie Sterne geboren werden und andere verblassen?" {n}Der Blick des Aeldari taut ein bisschen auf.{/n} "Erzählt mir, wohin ihr Weg sie geführt hat, Chem-Pan-Sey,"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Yrliet'i... Uzun yıllar boyunca yuvasından uzak kalmak için Yurtsuzun Yolu'nda yürümeye koyulan, yıldızların doğuşunu ve ölüşünü izleyen çocuğu tanıyor musun?" {n}Aeldari'nin bakışları bir miktar yumuşuyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh, Yolunun onu nereye götürdüğünü söyle."
languages.original_text: "You know Yrliet? The child that set out on the Path of the Outcast to spend long years away from home, watching stars be born and other stars fade?" {n}The Aeldari's gaze thaws a little.{/n} "Tell me where her Path has taken her, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet'i... Uzun yıllar boyunca yuvasından uzak kalmak için Yurtsuzun Yolu'na çıkan, yıldızların doğuşunu ve ölüşünü izleyen çocuğu tanıyor musun?" {n}Aeldari'nin bakışları bir miktar yumuşuyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh, bana Yolunun onu nereye götürdüğünü söyle."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
